ygData.subject: Re: Gear choices, need some advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Sirensa, Unless you play a Dark Elf Cleric  My cleric is wearing gator legs and a runed mithril tunic. She looks good in all leather... Lanadina Dui Shae
ygData.messageBody:
Sirensa,

Unless you play a Dark Elf Cleric <G> My cleric is wearing gator legs and a
runed mithril tunic. She looks good in all leather...<G>

Lanadina Dui'Shae
Level 50 DE Magician

Selice Valorheart
Level 32 DE Cleric


----Original Message Follows----
From: "Sirensa Qi'Seraph" <Sirensa@...>
Legs:
Yup - Gatorscale looks like leather - ewwwww (I refused to wear them in a
fashion fit)
I wore plate leggings instead (bronze, steel, rubi, silver-plated, EM -
depending on my level)
